          <title>
            <string language="en">Spreading out of gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbreiten aus Gasen heraus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propagation hors des gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espalhar fora dos gáses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spargendosi dai gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάδοση από τα αέρια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El separarse fuera de los gases</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations showing the spreading out or diffusion of gases. This shows that as the smoke coming out from the food spreads out, the chef can smell the goodness of the food.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cooking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">diffusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">smelling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">smoke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spreading out</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, die 
verbreiten heraus oder Diffusion (Zerstäubung) der Gase zeigen. 
Dieses zeigt, daß, während der Rauch, der heraus von der 
Nahrung kommt, heraus verbreitet, der Chef die Güte der Nahrung 
riechen kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux illustrations montrant 
étendre ou diffusion des gaz. Ceci prouve que pendant que la 
fumée venant dehors de la nourriture étend, le chef peut sentir la 
qualité de la nourriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações que mostram 
espalhar para fora ou difusão dos gáses. Isto mostra que 
enquanto o fumo que vem para fora do alimento espalha para fora, o 
chef pode cheirar o goodness do alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni che 
mostrano la diffusione fuori o diffusione dei gas. Ciò indica 
che mentre il fumo che viene fuori dall'alimento si sparge fuori, il 
chef può sentire l'odore della qualità dell'alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τη διάδοση 
έξω ή διάχυση των αερίων. Αυτό δείχνει ότι καθώς ο 
καπνός που προέρχεται από τα τρόφιμα διαδίδει έξω, ο 
αρχιμάγειρας μπορεί να μυρίσει την καλοσύνη των τροφίμων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones que 
muestran separarse hacia fuera o la difusión de gases. Esto 
muestra que como el humo que viene hacia fuera del alimento se separa 
hacia fuera, el cocinero puede oler la calidad del alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kochen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diffusion (Zerstäubung)</string>
          </keyword>
